rows.label: qev091802_MSG0001
rows.name: Murderess. Listen, there are some Mediators looking for—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0002
rows.name: Yeah, we know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0003
rows.name:
We're playing sleuth now, thanks to the
selfless intervention of a certain BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh. Then I guess you came here for intel, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0005
rows.name: Right. So gimme all ya got![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0006
rows.name: I've got nothing. ...Sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0007
rows.name: All I know is that you're the investigation's prime suspect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0008
rows.name: Wow, they REALLY don't trust me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0009
rows.name: But I believe you didn't do what they say you did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0010
rows.name: Let me look around on my own, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0011
rows.name: Thanks. We'll ask around town while you're at it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0012
rows.name: All right. I'll start digging up leads ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0013
rows.name: What did your search turn up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0014
rows.name: I've got a question for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0015
rows.name:
Were all of the male victims shot
in the right thigh and between the eyes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0016
rows.name: That's what I heard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0018
rows.name: And the women were all shot in the foot and temple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0019
rows.name: Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0020
rows.name: Pretty weird, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_JNK0010
rows.name: Assert

rows.label: qev091802_SEL0011
rows.name: Claim that the bodies are a message.

rows.label: qev091802_JNK0020
rows.name: Assume

rows.label: qev091802_SEL0021
rows.name: Guess that the Ganglion are behind it.

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0021
rows.name: I could buy that the killer is trying to say something with this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0022
rows.name: I just have no idea what that is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0023
rows.name: This is pretty nickel-and-dime stuff for them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0024
rows.name:
They're more interested in wiping us all out
of existence, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0025
rows.name:
Which means we're probably looking for a human.
But what's the motive...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0026
rows.name: I've got it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0027
rows.name: Right down to the perp's name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0028
rows.name: You do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0029
rows.name: It's Dale Gibbon. The bastard who killed my parents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0030
rows.name: What?! How can you be sure?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0031
rows.name:
My father was shot in the same way
as Otis and the other men.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0032
rows.name: And my mother the same as Yolanda and the other women.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0033
rows.name:
Even the number of victims lines up.
It's just like what happened back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0034
rows.name: Wait. You're saying a serial killer made it onto the Whale?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0035
rows.name:
He was captured and sentenced to death,
but it has to be him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0036
rows.name: ...Heh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0037
rows.name: Um, Murderess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0038
rows.name:
There's no way this isn't about me.
He's sending me a challenge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0039
rows.name: This is my dream. Not a day goes by where I don't—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev091802_SEL0031
rows.name: Offer to put a bounty out on Gibbon.

rows.label: qev091802_JNK0040
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev091802_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask the Murderess if she's planning revenge.

rows.label: qev091802_JNK0050
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev091802_SEL0051
rows.name:
Tell the Murderess that you thought her
dream was to restore her family name.

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0040
rows.name: No. No one else gets even a whiff of this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0041
rows.name: This bastard is mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0042
rows.name: I'd gladly kill him for free.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0043
rows.name: Of course I am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0044
rows.name:
I swore to kill the bastard the day
he gunned my parents down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0045
rows.name: Who said a girl can only have one dream?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0046
rows.name:
The family name is one thing,
and killing this ratbag is another.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0047
rows.name:
You can't just go kill somebody in cold blood.
It's illegal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0048
rows.name:
Oh, right. And where was that law
when he killed my parents, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0049
rows.name:
That's not the—
Hey, you have to help me stop her![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_JNK0060
rows.name: Persuade

rows.label: qev091802_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell the Murderess to consider Irina.

rows.label: qev091802_JNK0070
rows.name: Caution

rows.label: qev091802_SEL0071
rows.name:
Tell the Murderess that killing Dale Gibbon
could impact her other dream.

rows.label: qev091802_JNK0080
rows.name: Offer

rows.label: qev091802_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell the Murderess that you'll go with her.

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0050
rows.name: She has nothing to do with this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0051
rows.name: If I kill a guy and go on the run, that's my business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0052
rows.name: She's serving as collateral for you, Murderess![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0053
rows.name: Are you going to hang her out to dry?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0054
rows.name: Of course not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0055
rows.name: They're not ACTUALLY gonna keep her locked up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0056
rows.name: Once I kill the guy who did it, they'll let her go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0057
rows.name: Murderess...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0058
rows.name: Urgh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0059
rows.name:
Exactly. Do you really want to throw away
all that hard work? All that money?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0060
rows.name:
Your parents would be proud to know
you restored the family name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0061
rows.name:
Do you think they'd be happy to learn
their daughter is also a killer?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0062
rows.name: ...I don't know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0063
rows.name: I have to see him. Then I'll figure out what comes next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0064
rows.name: Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0065
rows.name: I knew you'd have my back on this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0066
rows.name: I made my mind up about this a long time ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0067
rows.name: So stop trying to convince me and tell me where he is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0068
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0069
rows.name:
Look, I have a couple of leads, but I don't know
if any of them are this Gibbon person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0070
rows.name:
If you say one of those suspects is me again,
I WILL kill you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0071
rows.name: Heh! Let's see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0074
rows.name: So one of those two men is actually Dale Gibbon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0075
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0076
rows.name: Thank you, Eleonora.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0077
rows.name:
Let's go. That monster stole my future.
It's time for me to steal his.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0079
rows.name:
So one is an Interceptor named Martin
who's currently somewhere in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0084
rows.name:
The other is a Prospector named Dart whose
last known whereabouts were out in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0085
rows.name: Are you really sure the perpetrator is Dale Gibbon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0086
rows.name:
I mean, isn't it possible that it was someone else?
Maybe a police detective who was working the case?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0087
rows.name: Either way, it's clearly someone who knows me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0088
rows.name:
And whether it's Dale or someone else,
I won't be satisfied until I find out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0089
rows.name: So I'm going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0090
rows.name: Murderess! You're back...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0091
rows.name: That's one dream off the bucket list.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0092
rows.name: R-right...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091802_MSG0093
rows.name:
I'm afraid there's not much I can do,
but whatever I CAN do, I will![ST:wait ]
